Configuration Presets
func:
node.status({ fill:'yellow', shape:'ring', text:'configuring' })
  const ModelFolder = path.join(process.env.HOME,'.node-red')
  flow.set('ModelFolder',ModelFolder)

  const ExecutableFolder = path.join(process.env.HOME,'.node-red')
  flow.set('ExecutableFolder',ExecutableFolder)

flow.set('DefaultTextModel',      '42dot_LLM-SFT-1.3B_Q8_0.gguf')
  flow.set('DefaultCodeModel',      'deepseek-coder-6.7b-instruct')
flow.set('DefaultEmbeddingsModel','42dot_LLM-SFT-1.3B_Q8_0.gguf')
node.status({ fill:'green', shape:'dot', text:'configured' })

return msg
